title: TwoFish and Chips With Peas or Beans and Two Hot Drinks for £8 at Oliver’sRestaurant and Takeaway (Up to £18.20 Value)
highlights:
• Choice of haddock or cod fish
  • Vegetarian burger alternative
  • Sides of mushy peas, garden peas, or beans
  • Fully air-conditioned
  • Kids’ menu and colouring-in 
  • Tea, Americano, or espresso

title: Falconryand Outdoor Pursuits Open Day for £39 at Fallowfields Falconry (£150 Value)
highlights:
• Two hour falconry experience
  • Air rifle shooting, archery, ferret racing and catapulting
  • Refreshments throughout the day
  • Lunch available at hotel or bring your own picnic
  • Open seven days a week

title: 90 Minute High-Speed Boat Trip On The Solent For Two for £49 with Seadogz (£110 Value)
highlights:
• Scenic trip in a Rigid-Inflatable Boat (RIB)
  • Take in views of The Isle of Wight
  • Trip across The Solent
  • All vessels are fully insured
  • Safety briefing provided
